title: crash
body: My account got a leaverbuster because my pc crashed. I am never ragequitting and not leaving so can you please take away my 20 min before queue? If not im not playing this game anymore

replies.body: Crashing sucks, but [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat every equally because all leaves still cause a negative experience.  The best way to recover from this is to resolve whatever caused the crash to happen in the first place.  Give me some more info on what's happening exactly.  Did you get any errors, like a bugsplat?

I've been patient but its a slow day for help&support :c... please answer me~

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EN4d0AAX-when-is-bewitched-morgana-early-sale
